manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: JQHZH2023 Latest Bluetooth 5.0 technology features faster and stable signal transmission, clearer sound quality and lower power， Comfortable, wearable, and durable. This is a wearable speaker with a flexible design that you can wear around your neck and enjoy immersive 3D sound effects. Through Bluetooth connection, you can wirelessly connect to different sources. It also supports clear call voice. The speaker is made of durable materials and ergonomic design, which can be worn all day.

Used during office hours The speaker is made of Safety Materials silicone material and ergonomic design, can be worn all day long, with this speaker to avoid the discomfort and pressure brought by headphones, the sound is delivered directly to the ear without disturbing others, surrounded by clear, full sound Watching you, creating a private music area while working Used while driving With this speaker, you can enjoy immersive 3D sound effects, and the built-in microphone provides clear hands-free calls, so you don’t have to worry about missing clues around you while driving, and it can also protect your eardrums Used during cooking Whether you are cooking or doing other housework, this speaker can bring a new listening experience, as if listening to music at Carnegie Hall live. It has powerful high, crisp mid, and rich bass that will make you feel like you are there!

Used outdoors With this speaker I believe you can enjoy all the wonderful musicality of this world anywhere, listen to the sounds of nature - relax yourself and enhance the listening experience with immersive sound. Strong battery life can provide you with all-day music power. Used during gaming The speaker's built-in dual-microphone echo cancellation technology resolves ambient noise and enables clear calls. Audio and video synchronization <60ms, low latency, better game and video experience, restore the real scene, and help you win the game more easily For outdoor travel With this speaker, you can enjoy music no matter you are doing outdoor sports, such as walking, cycling, mountain climbing, etc. You can free your hands and ears to enjoy music, answer calls, and keep in touch with the world around you, accompanying you on various trips

The first time you turn on the charging, search for and connect to Bluetooth JQ110 to start working. Key 1: Short press the previous song, long press to increase the volume, quick press twice to switch between the radio/TF card and Bluetooth playback mode, (after switching music playback, press 2 to start working) Key 2: Long press to start/end working, Short press play/pause (when answering a call, press once to answer/end, double-click twice to reject the call) key 3: Short press the previous song, long press to decrease the volume

The latest Bluetooth 5.5 technology Fast and stable transmission with the latest Bluetooth 5.5 technology for easy hands-free communication. 360° spatial sound Advanced immersive stereo sound, feel the sound around you, immerse yourself in the action Speaker combined with the latest power management technology, built-in high-efficiency lithium polymer battery, can provide up to 10+ hours of superior audio soft and comfortable Soft silicone material and lightweight adjustable design, can be bent at any angle, not easy to deform and durable, once you put this neck strap around your neck, you will hardly know that you are wearing it, and get a unique immersive experience sound experience. Safety Materials We use Safety Materials silicone anti-allergic materials that have no harm to the human body, and can be used with confidence by both the elderly and children.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought to use with my tv .. it saved my marriage 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to home headphone wearing
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I do a lot of moving around and listen to a lot on headphones, but over time they give my migraines (over ear) or make my ears hurt (in ear), and this gives me the opportunity to continue listening to content conveniently.The only downside is the volume control is not as easy as I would like, the controls for that would be so much better if the were swapped.1 press on the up arrow skip/next, and long press for volume up.1 press on the down arrow return, and long press for volume down.But that could be because I'm listening to podcasts, instead of music.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great sound. Easy to use. Comfortable to wear. Not fond of the voice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Connects to Bluetooth very quickly, good sound quality, and it’s so portable because it’s on my neck all time. Can’t say enough good things about it. Plus it’s super affordable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sorry; i really "WANTED" this to work, but no...
reviews.reviewText: Sound breaks up terribly. I contacted Amazon Tech Support who quickly and graciously issued a refund.Sad. The device is SUPER comfortable; feels like an air travel neck cushion.BUT the sound cuts out every split second and it's so absolutely maddening i just want it to STOP!Between split seconds, when there "IS" sound - it's extremely good. Clear, sharp and resonant. But that breaking up stuff is like nails on a chalkboard, but amplified with speakers beneath each ear!! No matter how good the split second's worth of sound - THEY MUST BE STOPPED!! :-Di sincerely hope this review helps.Thanks again to Amazon, for making the refund so easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A portable stereo
reviews.reviewText: It's a new experience, you can listen to your favorite music anywhere, and it would be better if the sound quality was better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Battery barely lasts 2 hours,at medium volume. I know the price is cheap but if it can barely be used,it's not worth even that.
